full_address: 1, 2 & 4/109 Clifton Springs Road, Clifton Springs, Vic 3222
description:
The Feel:
In a brand-new display of contemporary design in an enviable bayside location, this soon-to-be completed development sets a high benchmark for living and entertaining excellence. Construction is currently underway on three double-storey residences which offer exceptional potential for buyers seeking sophisticated permanent living, a luxurious weekender, or an outstanding investment opportunity. The sought-after location also neighbours a park with playground, is within walking distance of Drysdale’s amenities and is just a few minutes from the area’s first-rate recreational activities.

The Facts:
-Due for completion in early 2023, this exclusive development offers three luxury residences, custom built by Silvercon Constructions
-Refined coastal luxury with premium finishes & quality appliances
-Considered floorplans comprise a spacious layout (26-28 squares approx.) with dual living, providing room for the whole family to enjoy
-Double-storey layout includes a luxurious master suite with WIR & ensuite, plus 3 additional BRs, all with BIRs
-Two of the homes offer reverse living, allowing you to choose a floorplan to suit your needs
-North-facing indoor & outdoor living capture glimpses of Corio Bay
-Extensive glazing harnesses an abundance of natural light
-Open plan living, kitchen & meals accesses private exterior decks via sliding doors
-Showpiece kitchens boast stone benchtops, including waterfall island with breakfast seating
-Kleenmaid 900mm black glass gas cooktop & multifunction electric wall oven, fixed undermount SS rangehood, & Franke double sink
-Luxe family bathrooms with freestanding bath, shower, vanity & separate WC
-Timber accents add natural interior warmth, to complement sleek black fittings & aluminium windows
-Blackbutt flooring to 2 homes, with Highland Oak flooring to the third
-Split system heating & cooling to all living areas, plus ceiling fan to main living/dining
-DLUG with internal & rear access, features Colourbond sectional door
-Additional premium features: double glazed windows & sliding doors, stone benchtops to all wet areas & high ceilings throughout
-Low maintenance gardens with rainwater storage & Rockvale pathways add to the relaxed coastal feel
-Keep the kids entertained with the neighbouring Sundial Drive Reserve & playground
-Easy walk or to Drysdale Primary School (600m) and Drysdale town centre for shopping & dining (1km)
-A host of recreational options are close by including Clifton Springs Boat Ramp, Golf Course and The Dell all just minutes away

The Owner Loves….
“Bright, sun-drenched interiors lead to private outdoor zones, creating individual havens for easy indoor-outdoor living. The proximity to the Drysdale village, schools and the bay will make for the perfect coastal lifestyle, with very little maintenance required.”
